###Introducing medals

Please take a look at the medals vignette! 

```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("jmmaronge/medals")
library(medals)
vignette(topic="medals_vignette",package="medals")
```
